Sentencas: Crystalline yttria and calcia doped ceria powder, with a composition of Ce0.8Y0.18Ca0.02O2-delta has been prepared by a coprecipitation procedure from the corresponding nitrates of component cations.
Titulo: Synthesis, sintering and electrical properties of yttria-calcia-doped ceria

Sentencas: Nanopowder was obtained after thermal treatment at 700 degrees C 2 It of the coprecipitated mixtures.
Titulo: Synthesis, sintering and electrical properties of yttria-calcia-doped ceria
Synthesis, sintering and electrical properties of yttria-calcia-doped ceria

Sentencas: Isostatically and uniaxially pressed pellets were prepared from the powder.
Titulo: Synthesis, sintering and electrical properties of yttria-calcia-doped ceria

Sentencas: Sintering behaviour was followed by CHR dilatometer.
Titulo: Synthesis, sintering and electrical properties of yttria-calcia-doped ceria

Sentencas: Isothermal sintering was carried out between 1100 and 1300 degrees C. Apparent density as high as 98% D-th was attained by firing isostatically pressed pellets at 1150 degrees C 4 h. Uniaxially pressed pellets attained the same apparent density at 1275 degrees C 2 h, being in both cases very low the densification temperatures.
Titulo: Synthesis, sintering and electrical properties of yttria-calcia-doped ceria

Sentencas: Microstructure was observed by scanning electron microscopy (SEM).
Titulo: Synthesis, sintering and electrical properties of yttria-calcia-doped ceria

Sentencas: Ionic conductivity was determined by complex impedance spectroscopy.
Titulo: Synthesis, sintering and electrical properties of yttria-calcia-doped ceria

Sentencas: Bulk and grain boundary conductivities have similar values, and the total conductivity attains good value compatible with the use as electrolyte in solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Synthesis, sintering and electrical properties of yttria-calcia-doped ceria
Synthesis, sintering and electrical properties of yttria-calcia-doped ceria
Synthesis, sintering and electrical properties of yttria-calcia-doped ceria
